pullRequest.body:
#12829 made `Algebra.Parity` almost empty. This PR deletes it.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->
- [x] depends on: #11986
- [x] depends on: #12829

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

| a/Mathlib/Algebra/Parity.lean | `-` | `theorem range_two_mul (α) [Semiring α] : (Set.range fun x : α => 2 * x) = { a | Even a } := by` |
---
* 41  added declarations
* 62  removed declarations
* 2  paired declarations
---

You can run this locally using
```bash
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
My main takeaway is that the number of `+`s and `-`s is not the same.
Yes, as I said in the PR description, I deleted some long deprecated lemmas that didn't really have a nice home anymore

In case it is helpful, I think that these are the declarations whose names are not paired:
```
+ Additive.instDecidablePredEven
- even_abs
- even_iff_exists_bit0
+ isSquare_mabs
+ Multiplicative.instDecidablePredIsSquare
- odd_abs
+ odd_one_add_self_self
- one_add_self_self
```
This list looks very wrong
I think that I know what is wrong: let me try to come up with something better!
@YaelDillies, I updated the list above: does it look better now?
Since Johan complained, I've split the moves to #12829.

This PR/issue depends on:
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#11986~~
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#12829~~
By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (🤖). Happy coding!
<!-- By Dependent Issues (Action) - DO NOT REMOVE -->

Thanks :tada:

```suggestion
`Mathlib.Algebra.Ring.Parity` for the definition of odd elements.
```
I don't think this is useful but okay

My main takeaway is that the number of `+`s and `-`s is not the same.
Yes, as I said in the PR description, I deleted some long deprecated lemmas that didn't really have a nice home anymore

In case it is helpful, I think that these are the declarations whose names are not paired:
```
+ Additive.instDecidablePredEven
- even_abs
- even_iff_exists_bit0
+ isSquare_mabs
+ Multiplicative.instDecidablePredIsSquare
- odd_abs
+ odd_one_add_self_self
- one_add_self_self
```
This list looks very wrong
I think that I know what is wrong: let me try to come up with something better!
